website_summaries.verdict: A voice amplifier that quickly charges via a USB cord and is backed by service that enhances the product's experience.
pros: Users rave about the crisp sound
Customers who teach or experience vocal challenges especially like that even after an hour, sound quality still holds strong
cons: Contact customer service if you experience challenges connecting the headset and Bluetooth

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The device works very well. I just used it for a presentation in a fairly large room to a group of 80 people, and it boosted my weak voice nicely without feedback, which was my only concern. The device ran at full volume for an hour lecture, and seems to have plenty of power left. The headset band is a bit small for my big head and hair. The photo shows the device on my pant, just a white ring really, and the headset with the band buried in my hair. This is a really great aid for doing presentations or running meetings, particularly if one is having trouble with one's own vocal volume.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle P

customer_reviews.title: I lost my voice due to an illiness. My ...
customer_reviews.text: I lost my voice due to an illiness. My choices were surgery (would last about two months); a device you held to the larynx (600 dollars) or the Winbridge. It took a short time to charge it and then figured the volume since it does have feedback. I just use the clip to the belt since I am in bed or in a large chair. It has so many other features that my son (who is a musician) was impressed. My family and friends are thrilled since they don't have to sit as close and ask me to repeat myself.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Mehling

customer_reviews.title: I think this is best for a classroom teacher or speaker that will not be teaching a fitness class.
customer_reviews.text: I teach yoga and I needed to increase voice volume as I am teaching in a Community Center gym. This is a relatively effective headset amplifier in a compact package. It is difficult to wear equipment when demonstrating and teaching a fitness class. I need something even more compact but this is the closest thing I have found. Does not distort the voice but makes it easier for students to hear in a large space.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Great projection and sound!
customer_reviews.text: Previously, I used a competitor’s voice amplifier and this one way out performs it. Light weight, good quality. I used this in a double class room when teaching a lab. It has helped with efficiency since I can easily be heard when giving directions or moving onto the next skill. Great product! I bought 2 worried the battery on one wouldn’t last for a 6 hour lab. Of course I do not use every minute, but I do use it a lot. Same amplifier lasted 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Failed suddenly - put mike on before turning on power
customer_reviews.text: Worked well the first time I used it. But when setting it up the second time, I got the microphone too close to the loudspeaker. That caused the usual very loud feedback-squeal. But the squeal suddenly stopped and the Amplifier was dead. The amplitude of the squeal was too much for the electronics to handle and the circuit failed. I later learned that this is a common problem with this sort of amplifier. Put the mike on your head and the speaker in place (not too close to mike) before turning on the power! The new one I got made a big point of this in the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: A. J. Dessler

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for someone I know with Parkinsons Disease ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for someone I know with Parkinsons Disease who has a hard time being heard. This really amplified their voice and allowed them to be part of the conversation again.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna BTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Like it Very Much
customer_reviews.text: I am creating a Mandalorian cosplay and I needed a voice amplifier. I am very pleased with the price and the quality of this mic. The ONLY draw back is this ... it's rechargeable. By you can't keep it plugged into a portable power source and use it at the same time. At least that appears to be something it is unable to do. So bring your back up charger with you, and know you may have to pause use of it until it is recharged. Other than that, pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: M.G. Trehern

customer_reviews.title: Great for small groups
customer_reviews.text: Before the lockdown, I used this in my craft classes. The sound isn't that loud but it did help my Crafters hear me in a crowded bar. The controls were easy to use, I didn't receive much microphone feedback. For the price, it's a great unit to start with for smaller presentations.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene Sugarbaker

customer_reviews.title: Great product, even better customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for years. I have a few. They all work amazing and make my job so much easier! I no longer have to lose my voice after every party - I can just talk at a normal volume and everyone hears me clearly! I can even turn up the volume to drown out noisy people! I accidentally lost the clip part on the back of one of my units and wrote to the seller to inquire about how to purchase a new piece....and they sent me 2 for free!!!!! Great customer service! Thank you so much!!!
customer_reviews.author: mommafishy

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It worked for 1 presentation. Charged it plenty and then some, but would not perform again. waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Cochran Butler

customer_reviews.title: Really nice amplifier to use in a classroom
customer_reviews.text: I’m a teacher and have lost my voice so many times this past year from talking to loud in the classroom. I bought this to help amplify my voice and it works great. I had previously bought and returned another brand because it sounded “tinny” and like I was talking from far away. This doesn’t make me sound like that at all; I actually think I sound really natural. I like and would recommend this amplifier.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Good for a Quiet Audience
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to amplify voices when speaking with a large group of about 75-100 people. It works well indoors and when the audience is quiet. When we used it outdoors where we already have a water fountain and the audience was chatting with each other, you could barely hear the speaker. So it just depends on the use you need from it. We would be better served with a real mic & larger speaker that can be louder.
customer_reviews.author: Girl Reading

customer_reviews.title: Works great for singing in a nursing home.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to use when I sing for seniors in a nursing home. When I asked how they liked the new amplifier they were delighted! More of them could hear my voice and understand the words. It really helped me because my voice lasted longer.. I was worried that it would change my voice and it would be too harsh but that wasn't the case. I don't like having a mike in front of me because I can't look around and gain eye contact with the residents during a song. I like to welcome them and give them a big smile. It means so much to them. I've very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn M.

customer_reviews.title: Cool!
customer_reviews.text: It is an amazing and very cool Portable Voice Amplifier. The sound quality is good and there is no noise. Works great for lecture. The quality is good and powerful. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: alsalami70

customer_reviews.title: Loud and easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: This portable voice amplifier is Loud and easy to carry! We used it at a rally and everyone was able to hear and chant along with the person talking on the microphone! It did not have any feedback and the sound was clear. For the price, this is great! The max volume is not as high as higher end and more expensive products though! This was perfect for a rally with roughly 35 people!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Suh

customer_reviews.title: Great little gadget!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little gadget. The sound quality is excellent and it has a long battery life. It can attach to your waistband, but kept falling off when I bent over. It hit the cement floor several times. It is durable! It didn’t break. I now use the shoulder strap that comes with it and have taped it on so it won’t fall off. I am a teacher and use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia C. Goeb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This amplifier is a great product, and very reasonably priced. My wife has speech problems and unable to project her voice. This amplifier helps her to conduct a meaningful conversation. I did purchase a cheap clip-on microphone which is more convenient than the headset that comes with the unit, although the provided microphone does work well. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Louder than thy
customer_reviews.text: Its a handy little device, it does what is says. The price is great, I've only used the voice function as of now but I plan on trying the mp3 later. I would recommend this others, the high pitched feedback only happens when the speaker is faced to the Mic, and when the volume is up as high as it can go. Which really isn't needed because even at a lower setting it amplifies very well.
customer_reviews.author: Travis T

customer_reviews.title: I have no idea how people are rating this item so highly.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is fine, I don't know about the battery life. The headset is god awful, cheaply constructed, fits poorly and I have no idea how someone could ever possibly move with this thing. Think I'm going to be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Kerynl

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor tours
customer_reviews.text: I regularly give outdoor tours in Milwaukee and this has really streamlined the experience. The group can keep walking, which speeds everything up. I'm often out in windy areas and the microphone doesn't pick up the wind. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Kramer

customer_reviews.title: I wish it worked better. I wanted to use it for public presentations
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I wish it worked better. I wanted to use it for public presentations, since my voice is rather quiet, but this device doesn't really help me out all too much. The headset is very ugly and not very professional looking. I tried replacing it with a lapel microphone, but the placement of the speaker creates a lot of headaches, as it produces near constant feedback, and the volume is very finicky.
customer_reviews.author: Iret

customer_reviews.title: Great for preventing vocal fatigue through shouting
customer_reviews.text: So far, excellent for use with students in noisy classrooms. They all hear me and I don't have to shout. My voice is standing up better and I am able to sing on weekends now. It's no substitute for good breathing and speaking technique, and you still have to train yourself not to shout or strain the vocal muscles when you hear the background noise level rise, but it certainly allows you to use resting volume and still be audible. Haven't tried the other functions yet, but the battery lasted through my entire first week of classes and only gave out the Thursday of the second week. Great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: N. Job

customer_reviews.title: This is a great company that stands behind their products
customer_reviews.text: This is a great company that stands behind their products. When one of the mics/head set attached to the system broke they sent me a new one right out without charging me. They followed up with me and they provide GREAT customer service. For my business, I need these portable mics and have bought several. This is THE BEST!!! and the price is excellent. Thank you WinBridge!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Liz Grebler

customer_reviews.title: Speak louder than ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my mom who is a teacher and she absolutely loves it. She doesn't have to stress on her voice/throat any more and can lecture larger audience with ease. Considering that she isn't very tech savvy, I think the product is very easy to use and control.
customer_reviews.author: Yashesh

customer_reviews.title: You need one of these!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my, I had no idea I needed this so badly! It's the bomb, no kidding. So lightweight and easy to figure out. Didn't take long to charge (no batteries!) and it really made all the difference at an outdoor event on a windy day when someone was explaining something to our group. I thought the wind would be a problem with the microphone, but not at all! I added a carabiner clip to the strap to make it easier to take off and on, but this thing is worth its weight in gold!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not as powerful and clear sound production as the more expensive ones out there, but works well for what we need it to do. We actually wear the headset upside down around the neck, so it rests on the collar, and it works well for both comfort and mic placement. The battery lasts through a full day of teaching; we have yet to drain it completely. It can be prone to occasional feedback since wearing the speaker puts it quite close to the microphone on your head, but careful placement can minimize this or avoid it completely.
customer_reviews.author: abombtmc

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 5 year old to sing around and it has been awesome! This works WAY better than the kiddie toy versions of microphones and sounds excellent. I was very surprised by how loud this thing gets! We've been having fun with it with our own karaoke nights and totally worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: This little amplifier is designed to save your throat
customer_reviews.text: This little amplifier is designed to save your throat. It provides clear sound with no distortion or static. It’s suitable for about a 10,000 square-foot room or a group of 25 – 50 people. The compact size is great for clipping on your belt or pocket, and it’s lightweight at 4.8 ounce. It comes with a waist belt to tie around your waist or your neck if you don’t happen to be wearing a belt. If you teach physical education, coach a team, or go on many field trips, this is the amplifier for you.
customer_reviews.author: James Jones

customer_reviews.title: Low quality product
customer_reviews.text: Worked well when I got it charged it and used it. I put it down for about 9 months charged it wouldn't turn on. I cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic voice amp for those with small voices that need to be heard.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't use this personally, but the person this was given to loved it. They had recently started a walking tour of downtown and with the traffic it was hard to hear her. This small lightweight voice amp did just the trick (in most cases) to elevate her voice above any loud noises. Well done, she loved it and has been using it ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Colwill

customer_reviews.title: Great price, good volume but not good sound.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing volume for a small package, decent mic, OK sound quality for the price, but it's really very tinny. Rechargeable battery and USB port, too. I wouldn't use it for music; not sure it's really good enough for performance of spoken word. I am less enthusiastic than I was at first. I've revised this review significantly downward.
customer_reviews.author: JudyK45

customer_reviews.title: A great personal amplifier with portable microphone
customer_reviews.text: This personal amplifier is designed to have super clear sound. It accepts no ambient noise or distractions. It has 5 watts and covers a 10,000-square-foot room. Its small and lightweight with a clip on the back to fix on a belt or pocket. The built-in rechargeable lithium-ion battery provides long-term playing time. The headset and microphone are comfortable and fit like a headband or can be worn around the neck.
customer_reviews.author: H Wojciechowski

customer_reviews.title: Amplifying a very faint voice
customer_reviews.text: We have realized a modicum of success with this little amplifier. My wife's voice is very faint and if she tries to talk loud she is soon hoarse. We are still experiencing some difficulties with feedback, but I am working on methods of shielding the microphone to reduce this phenomenon.
customer_reviews.author: CAD User

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this for people having trouble with their voice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my friend who's had multiple voice surgeries. He loves it! He now wears it at meetings and other gatherings and is once again able to join in on conversations. He wishes the mic was a little less bulky, but other than that he's very happy with the technology.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M.

customer_reviews.title: It looks like it is going to be a winner!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to use it yet, but this Sunday I will be. Maybe I can come back and update this review then. It seems sturdy and easy to use so I'm looking forward to it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow... this is a great voice amplifier
customer_reviews.text: After researching and watching several product reviews on different voice amplifiers I decided to get this one, and I'm not disappointed at all. The volume level is fantastic. I added a flash drive with music so that I could speak and have some background music playing. I really think you will not be disappointed with this purchase. I'll be testing the battery length on one charge and let you know if I run into any issues.
customer_reviews.author: J. Crane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and ...comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a classical singer who is now teaching school part time... This is a voice saver! Works wonderfully in every way... especially comfortable head wire!!! ...clad in a material that makes it much more comfortable... Doesn't dig in to your scalp . Was important to me, because I wear it for three hours straight every Tuesday and Thursday .
customer_reviews.author: Lone Star Lark

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: The item works wonderfully. Although the mic didn't work, the seller sent a replacement right away. I really like that I can add a usb stick w/ music and let it run. I plan to use this for expos/meetups because I lose my voice after a while. I can at least speak softly using this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: tainamom

customer_reviews.title: Great clarity
customer_reviews.text: Was actually amazed at how well this works. Using it for outside preaching and bible study. People can definitely hear, the sound is not distorted and it works very well. Looks pretty good too.
customer_reviews.author: Roni

customer_reviews.title: Lite weight voice amplifier works as promoted
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight, charges quickly, has enough volume so that I am easily heard in fairly noisy outdoor locations. I have not yet used the microphone which is placed on the head; I have used the collar clip on and find it easier to hand hold it. I have not yet used the other features and doubt that I will since I bought this item for voice amplification and not to play audio files.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to use and charge
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to practice delivery professional presentations. Lightweight and easy to use and charge. I liked the headphone mike, better than clip on mike normally used in presentations, as you can turn your head with out losing sound volume. Gave 4 rating due to size of unit, larger than I like, however it was not a distraction, as I clipped to my pocket. Can also be held in hand. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: P. Taylor-Harris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for socially distant, mask-wearing teachers
customer_reviews.text: Bought 5 of these for my kids' teachers. The teachers love it because the kids can hear the teachers through their masks and at a distance.
customer_reviews.author: darren lisitza

customer_reviews.title: Product & Service Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: I use this device as hands-free microphone for tours while driving the vehicle. Can be used on walking tours as well. It is superior! I have not used its other features. Also, I had need of customer service which was outstanding -- fast, hassle-free, courteous. I will buy this same device from them again as my spare ... and will buy another one of the same for my church to use in the church hall and picnic area where there is no mic.
customer_reviews.author: Poodle Standard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a child!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 5 year old child to sing through and play with. Works perfectly and sounds good. Very fun! Decent quality product for a good price. Only had it for a few days but came basically fully charged and haven’t had to charge it yet aside from like 5 minutes when it came out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: E27

customer_reviews.title: Complectation of the device
customer_reviews.text: The device use my mother in the school. The work as a music teacher. She is satisfied with the device. It helps to save her voice. But for very big classrooms it is not so loud! As you saw on one of the photos, there are no charger for european type sockets! Goes only the USB cable, AND IT IS NOT SO LONG! So we take another cable and charger from Samsung Galaxy J5 phone. It fits very good. In other words - this is a good quality device for the money it costs!
customer_reviews.author: Jevgenijs

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for your voice!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! Bought to use in my classroom when I had voice trouble. Used it everyday and it saved me! The mouthpiece didn’t always stay up after awhile but you can hold it in place when you speak.
customer_reviews.author: Puppylove

customer_reviews.title: Quality queestionable- don't expect it to last long.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife who has poor voice volume due to handicap. Had to order two. The first on had issues with the power button not working. And, by the way, the light does not flash when it is charging. Only mediocre volume unless you are right up on the mic.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M Apple

customer_reviews.title: decent
customer_reviews.text: the pickup of the mic is a bit lower that I would expect for its size, but that might be good if used with an enclosed helmet. the battery does seem to drain while off.
customer_reviews.author: the_treeboy

customer_reviews.title: Great to use when yelling or speaking loudly is difficult & easy to charge and use
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I gifted this portable and rechargeable head set and speaker to a professor whose voice was compromised after an illness and larynx surgery. He told us that this tool helped him continue lecturing without any pain or strain on his voice.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Diaz

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with portable speaker. It’s very convenient and wire free. I’m able to charge the headset and the speaker without any problems. The sound is clear and loud enough.
customer_reviews.author: CATHERINE

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for my classroom
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two amplifiers. The first one lasted a long time. I was very pleased and I purchased another one. I also recommend it to my coworkers. I purchased another one in May. I didn't use it until August. It's now September and all you hear is a crackling sound. It's been fully charged and still you hear the sound. I am not able to speak to the students at all. I've waisted my money and now I have to purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: I am a teacher and with wearing a mask, I needed my voice projected more. This small lit weight device did the trick. It projects my voice nice and loud. Am very, very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable headset, but otherwise good product
customer_reviews.text: Product did well for voice amplification after surgery and voice loss. Charging instructions sketchy - plug into a USB port on computer or with cell phone jack. Battery life seemed good. Headset was uncomfortable. Decent value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: tonytiger7

customer_reviews.title: Low Budget Option
customer_reviews.text: It squeals when mic comes anywhere near the unit. Sound quality is not great but it's a low budget option for a school play.
customer_reviews.author: ejuneberry

customer_reviews.title: Works well... nice volume.
customer_reviews.text: Shockingly effective for the price. I taught with it all summer after having throat surgery. Helped provide the vocal rest I needed. Wish it was blue tooth so I didn’t have to wear the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: T Schoen

customer_reviews.title: Win!
customer_reviews.text: Seller was quick to ship. Product was packaged well. I had shopped around a while for something like this but found prices to be higher than could justify. When I saw this product that did everything I needed at such an exceptional price, I was hesitant. Didn't have to be. The product is great. I use it for horseback riding lessons that can be in a smaller enclosure, or in a 100' x 200' outdoor riding ring. With the range in the volume control,I can adjust to either environment.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Langmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: What I love about this is it keeps its charge a while. Previously I bought another one that had to be charged every 30 min. That's not practical when I am teaching a 60 min. class. With a previous model (different company), I'd have to clip the gizmo onto a belt (I don't always wear a belt). . . and then the clip fell off. This one offers a shoulder strap option which I like a lot.
customer_reviews.author: STH

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great product! Purchased I believe in April
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great product! Purchased I believe in April. Used to grab the attention of my second grade classroom during reading and lesson time. Great volume and clear as well! I have young children too. Great just for fun or to make a not so fun situation interesting!
customer_reviews.author: Stormi Weathers

customer_reviews.title: Great for Teaching
customer_reviews.text: We use this on field trips. It is loud enough for all of the students to hear us, but low enough not to disturb others. We started finding other uses for it as well. One of the welding teachers at my site uses it to teach since his students can't hear him when he has his welding mask on. Now everyone can hear his lectures. Necessity for a teacher.
customer_reviews.author: Jory Kusy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended. I love it
customer_reviews.text: So fantastic I have been recommending it to all my colleagues that regularly lecture for hours. I have not had a single sore throat after lecturing since I got this, months ago
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Portability and batteries go together.
customer_reviews.text: Whether you teach physical education or a small kindergarten class, a portable voice amplifier will improve your quality of teaching while protecting your health. I highly recommend this small speaker, it is lightweight, and can be worn around your neck or clipped to your belt. Batteries last abut five hours after fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: Jann R Elliott

customer_reviews.title: This was one of those that did not perform as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: It was recharged, by me, worked 2 days, lost all of it's charge, then when I plugged it in for a recharge it never turned back to blue to show that it was recharged. After about 9 hours of charging, I tested it and it was still not showing any blue when disconnected and no sound ever came from it, ever again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for training,tours,presentations
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small microphone and speaker to do training in a loud production environment and this was perfect. The size and options are great for plant tours, training, and other instances when the person speaking needs to be heard but doesn't need a clunky microphone and speaker setup.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Lee Lence

customer_reviews.title: Simple use and loud boost of voice.
customer_reviews.text: Item is light and seems flimsy but it is not. Already put it to use with a small group in an assisted living building, many of the members do not hear well, and some where hearing aids. This device came in real handy for boosting the voice and therefore met the expectation of why I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just slightly louder than normal voice.
customer_reviews.text: Family member was able to use this speaker to talk to people outdoors that wouldn’t normally be able to hear because of the traffic going by on adjacent street. It is slightly louder than normal talking voice but the sound can travel further.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Dye

customer_reviews.title: It’s lightweight and I attach it to my lanyard and put headpiece on and I’m good to go
customer_reviews.text: I found out that my right vocal cord was paralyzed...so I’m a PE teacher and it was very difficult to teach in the gym until I got the WinnBridge amplifier! It has saved me! I am slowly getting my voice back but even when it’s totally back I will continue to use it! I’ve been using the system for 8 weeks now and have had no issues! It’s lightweight and I attach it to my lanyard and put headpiece on and I’m good to go! I leave system on and just lower the volume if needed! I highly recommend this product! In fact, I usually use a bullhorn on field days and now I’ll use the WinnBridge!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Dodd

customer_reviews.title: Bad sound quality
customer_reviews.text: This device is very light, and cannot transmit louder sounds (bu 'loud' I mean projecting your voice to a 30 people classroom). Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Netuza

customer_reviews.title: A huge help!
customer_reviews.text: We love it. My Mom is getting really hard to understand but at least we can hear her now. She says she loves it because she doesn't have have to shout to make herself heard. She can use all her effort on enunciation. The unit works great, holds a charge for longer than we need it and is easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Omar S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and small enough to carry around
customer_reviews.text: This works great to boost voices that are not quite loud enough in a medium sized room. Not the best sound quality, but great volume for the price and very light and small so it's easy to pack in a bag. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Indeed it is a Win product!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute little gadget where you can just do presentation with this headphone on you and everyone in the room will hear you loud and clear. It is portable and easy to use so why not invest in one when you have a job that needs to do constant presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my classroom. The students even use it to make presentations. I have gotten numerous compliments on how well people can hear me speak on this. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: LKC

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay, could be better.
customer_reviews.text: It's loud, but not that loud. I used this in convention settings with high ambient noise. The loudest I could get this wasn't at its max. Mainly due to the fact that in order for me to use it at the loudest setting, the unit would have to be at full cord length away from me. Currently, if you keep this at your waist and the headset at your head (average distance for most humans), you will get severe feedback if you crank it up. The USB option to play from a USB device isn't great. Without a digital screen, you're pretty much in the dark at selecting whatever it is you want played back. Instructions were mediocre at best.
customer_reviews.author: Law

customer_reviews.title: Attention Ladies and Gentlemen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my 9 yo daughter. She absolutely loves it as do all the neighbor kids and cousins. Even the adults were trying it out at her birthday party using it to give zoo tours and airplane safety speeches. Everyone from age 5 to 65 was able to wear the headset comfortably. The clip is durable and the strap is also a nice feature. Even though it was purchased as a toy, this seems like a durable well made product that would work well for its intended purpose. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Wendik

customer_reviews.title: Works Beyond Expectations
customer_reviews.text: As a band director, I use it in band rehearsals so I don't overextend my voice. Band members say it really helps them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I used this amplifier on my outside tour the other night with about 30 people. It worked very well in noisy areas. It was loud enough without being so loud as to disturb others not with our group. The headset that comes with it is comfortable and worked well. I also purchased the clip on mic but experienced to much feedback. My only complaint is that it has kind of a plastic sound. But overall a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Very plastic.
customer_reviews.text: Clip to hold it to my belt broke on the first day. Very light weight, but bigger than it needs to be. Totally saving my voice as a teacher though now that I have to teach through a mask.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Too much feedback
customer_reviews.text: The feedback is constant. We have to adjust the volume constantly. If you turn it down, there is no voice elevation but if you turn it up, the screeching sound comes on. It was very distracting. We had to return these
customer_reviews.author: Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, loud, clear, voice and sore throat saving device.
customer_reviews.text: I used this to speak to a group of about 25 boys outdoors. This is a great product! I clipped it to my belt and it worked really well. Very happy. Was straining my voice way too much before I got this and this did the trick. And great price! Note: Don’t keep the receiver too close to mike on high volume or it will squeak.
customer_reviews.author: Fay

customer_reviews.title: Only works for 30 days
customer_reviews.text: Product quit after 1 month of use! I liked it till it quit.
customer_reviews.author: tat

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service Excellence
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one WinBridge WB001 Rechargeable Ultralight Portable Voice Amplifier Waist Support MP3 and found it exactly what was needed in our operation. I purchased another because it was that good. Sound is great. Unit is lightweight. The charging cord was defective. One call to customer service and two charging cords were on the way. I'll be using these products more and more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saved my moms voice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother who is a teacher and strains her voice all day at school. After using this device for just a couple of day her voice sounded much less raspy and she felt like she was putting out a lot less energy in her teaching. works well, except for the little bit feedback that happens.
customer_reviews.author: Abby L

customer_reviews.title: Overall Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for me in my classes of even 30 students. Saved my voice. It's kinda hard to position right on my belt. If I move too much, it pops off. Couldn't get it to hook on my jacket at all
customer_reviews.author: Ted Jordan

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Audio quality is nowhere near what I expected until I realized that this is a very cheap device and perhaps I shouldn't expect anything any better unless I spent a little more money.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Robison

customer_reviews.title: Pretty light-weight cheap looking plastic
customer_reviews.text: Pretty light-weight cheap looking plastic, but good deal for the price. Definitely does what I need it to do - I lecture in a classroom and my voice just doesn't hold up for a couple of hours, so it is perfect. I love that it recharges on USB.
customer_reviews.author: C. Chapek

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Very good. I use it to teach water fitness in a aquatic center. It was a reasonable price and has worked well so far.
customer_reviews.author: joe and ruth watkins

customer_reviews.title: Makes my wife a big mouth!
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this as she needed to have her class of 3rd graders speak during class presentations. Worked perfectly and several other teachers wanted them for the same reason. She can also use it on the playground and be heard without shouting.
customer_reviews.author: Cal

customer_reviews.title: Works better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I lost my voice due to thyroid radiation and can only whisper. My husband is hard of hearing which makes the problem even worse. It can be depressing not to be heard. We decided to give this unit a try and it works great! I would recommend it for anyone with a similar problem.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Lediard

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the amplifiers we purchased to use in our warehouse. They help our managers talk to their team while keeping a safe distance. One of our packages was missing a charging cord. I emailed the company and received a replacement cord very quickly. I would definitely order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: It works. I wish the volume went higher (I have a voice problem, and more volume would have been helpful), but maybe my search is futile. I bought the collar clip microphone and find it more comfortable than the headset.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: GD answer my question as to whether or not it would work for my purposes. I purchased it and installed it the day I received it. It does exactly what I needed and GD's advice as to placement was spot-on. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: TGWOH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for living room performances.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love to turn our living room into their stage. This was a perfect addition for their performances. They love using this to sing and dance. It works well.
customer_reviews.author: AdventuresinKrazyland

customer_reviews.title: This item is ok. The mike flops around and ...
customer_reviews.text: This item is ok. The mike flops around and is very difficult to get it to stay in front of the mouth without flopping down, left or right. If it is not directly in front of the mouth the mike doesn't magnify the voice.
customer_reviews.author: kb

customer_reviews.title: WendyPP
customer_reviews.text: Love this little machine for working with hard of hearing adults. I like the rechargeable battery but you will need a plug head to use the USB adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy PP

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy! The sound is clear. Easy to wear and simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for teaching a class of 10 students
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget is saving my voice! After 5 classes a day, I was returning home to no voice. Teaching a class with this on my waist belt is really helpful. It works best in a setting of about 10 students.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for teaching yoga
customer_reviews.text: Great for teaching yoga. I do need to put it underneath my outfit and probably will fortify it with tape to keep it in place, but that's just b/c I move a lot while teaaching.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful voice enhancement! Easily and quickly charged. So far I have used it through 4 1/2 hrs of teaching dance classes with no need yet to recharge. It is small and fits around my waist on the strap that comes with it. My students can hear me! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: JMSCPRW

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great for teachers. Rarely do I get feedback noises. You just have to keep mic at least 5 inches away from the box or other speaker.
customer_reviews.author: b.books2011

customer_reviews.title: Voice saved...
customer_reviews.text: My wife is a teacher who loses her voice a lot. This has saved it. Not sure if that is a good thing all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Good investment for teachers
customer_reviews.text: Using in 2nd gr Easy to put on and charge. No batteries so lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. A A

product_meta.title: WinBridge WB001 Rechargeable Ultralight Portable Voice Amplifier Waist Support MP3 Format Audio for Tour Guides, Teachers, Coaches, Presentations, Costumes, Etc.-Black
feature_bullets: 【Portable Speaker and Microphone】This WB001 Voice Amplifier is a really great aid for teachers or doing presentations or running meetings, smallish groups where leader must be heard, particularly if one is having trouble with one's own vocal volume.

【Personal Amplifier Speaker 】 A small and compact personal speaker that will project voice across the room. In addition to its ability to project voice from an adjustable microphone that is included in this product.

【Adjustable Headset Microphone 】This speaker with microphone headset can be positioned near your mouth with its flexible gooseneck design. The headset sits on top of the head so it is stable and won’t fall off

【Personal Amplifier】Portable speaker amp can also play music from TF card AND flash drive. Comes with a belt strap which can attaches with clips to the amplifier and then can be worn around the neck or through belt loops.
【Portable Pa System】Built-in rechargeable lithium battery offers you up to 5-8 hours of powerful amplification. WinBridge provides one year warranty and Lifetime technical support!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars677 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
